WHUK Linux VPS >> Flat 50% Off – SAS Storage - 24x7 Fully Managed << Limited Period

WHUK, a UK based host offering affordable yet quality web hosting services since 2001, now offering a discount of flat 50% on Linux based virtual servers for a limited period. The 24x7x365 fully managed services with Free end user support offers optimum performance and an ideal platform essential to run large websites, mobile apps and other install third party applications.

The discounts are applicable on following list of Linux VPS solutions offered by WHUK :

• CentOS 6.2 / Ubuntu Operating System
• Softaculous
• Full Root SSH Access
• 2 Dedicated IP’s
• Free 24x7 Premium Support, Fully Managed
• 99.95% Uptime Guarantee​
